title_full:
Moiré

              —
              Good Times
            
              (Hypercolour)
label: Hypercolour
description:
Packed with slo-mo knackered house time warpers and impressive vocal turns from DemiGosh, Moiré's third album is half Galcher Lustwerk and half Arthur Russell. Fuzzy, fwd and masterfully steady-handed, it's blunted and emotionally-charged >> deepest funk.

Deep house is a tough one to get right. When it's good, it's some of the best dance music out there... more

Ben UFO drops picks out two unexpected club belters for Melodies Record Club's DJ-friendly reissue series and it's a doozy: Laurie Spiegel's modular percussive headmelter 'Drums' on one side, and the Knife's Olof Dreijer's 'Echoes From Mamori' on the flip - a track made out of arpeggios generated from bird and frog recordings.

Trust Ben UFO to stick his name... more

description:
Debut album by Wolfgang Tillmans.

"Moon in Earthlight describes the phenomenon one can see in the first few days after a New Moon, when the slim crescent of the moon is completed into a full circle by a faint light that is not lit by sunlight but by the light reflected from Earth. It is also the apt title for the first album from an artist whose first love was astronomy... more
